alert.note: Alert for Elliott; Estill; Lee; Menifee; Morgan; Powell; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 14 at 10:40PM EST until January 16 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 5 inches with the higher amounts generally toward the southeastern portions of each county. * WHERE...Portions of east central and southeast Kentucky. * WHEN...Until noon EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Two rounds of snow are expected. The first round will move through the area tonight, before tapering off early Monday morning, with generally up to 3 inches of snowfall expected. The second round of snow arrives Monday afternoon and will continue through early Tuesday morning, producing up to 2 inches of snowfall.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Kentucky can be found by visiting https://goky.ky.gov.

area.areaDesc: Elliott; Estill; Lee; Menifee; Morgan; Powell; Wolfe
